item.title: [Python] 9 steps to become a machine learning expert in the shortest time [Completely free]
item.description: ## Introduction I don’t think you need to do Steps 1, 2 and 7 if you don’t have time. 1. Learn statistics Acquisition of Level 2 statistical test 2. Know the principle of ML Machine Learning -coursera Outline of gradient descent optimization algorithm 3. Learn Python Python -Google 4. Learn the basics of ML Machine Learning Crash Course

item.title: [Python] Machine learning Machine learning learned by a new graduate who has no experience in machine learning
item.description: This article is about how I learned machine learning by Nikkei xTECH Business AIâ‘¡ Advent Calendar 2019 __. Let’s talk about the steps that have taken a slightly different step from the general approach to learning machine learning. I would be happy if it could be used as a reference for as many people as possible. I usually write for individual blogs, and I was warmly thinking about writing on my blog, but I thought it was a great opportunity, so I posted it on __qiita for the first time __.
